msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch 'hlship-3-1'.

author: hlship
msg: Use PropertyUtils, not BeanUtils, to set properties of beans.  BeanUtils is too forgiving of errors (such as missing properties).

author: hlship
msg: Prune out unused or unneeded exception constructors for ApplicationRuntimeException and subclasses.

author: dsolis
msg: Add convenient methods to get and set component's properties by name.

author: dsolis
msg: Add cleanup code. Fix an error when used within a Foreach.
